title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character is replaced with spaces in the first line, the two lines are visually indented the same. When ShiftLeft is executed, the text moves. It is unclear how this behavior is specified, but in the first scenario, it appears that the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). Any stray space is confusing, as it is not clear why the text won't shift.
